Add a Brick.description: Title for the add a brick page

errorNoText.message: You must include a text value

Edit my Profile.description: Button label for action to edit users profile

Get Started.description: Button meaning: Get started making apps

by _.description: For apps, e.g. My Cool App, by {{name}}

Image.description: Type of block that can be added to the app

Name.description: Label on the profile page, e.g. Name: Kate, Location: Canada

App Name & Icon.description: Title within app editor for page where user can change the app name and icon

Make Your Own App.description: Title for app templates, starter projects/styles to create new apps

Make an App.description: Button label for action to make a new app

SMS.description: a text, as in 'Send a text message' (on a mobile phone)

name from location.description: E.g. Kate from Canada, sorry for all the html

Journalist.description: Title for an app for journalists

Business.description: Title for an app for business owners

From Scratch.description: Title for a blank app template. 'From Scratch' is an idiom that describes making something from the beginning with basic ingredients.

Teacher.description: Title for an app for teachers

Blogger.description: Title for an app for bloggers

same as minimum number.description: place holder for Initial number field

Edit.description: Button for allowing user to edit the app

Preview.description: Button that, if clicked, shows the end product of the app

Text.description: Type of block that can be added to the app

Sign In.description: Sign In button label (logs user into Webmaker Mobile)

Try as Guest.description: Label for action that allows a user to use the app without signing in.

Guest.description: Label for author when the user is in trial mode

Guest Explanation.message: Guests can build, but not publish apps.
Guest Explanation.description: Explains the effect of using the app as a not signed in guest.

Try in Offline Mode.description: Label for action that allows a user to use the app without signing in when the device is not connected to the internet.

Offline Mode Explanation.message: This device isn't connected to the internet, so you won't be able to publish any apps.
Offline Mode Explanation.description: Explains effect of using the app without an internet connection

Sign Out.description: Button label for button that logs user out of Webmaker Mobile

Delete my Apps.description: Button to delete all of a user's apps

Text Value.description: Label for attribute of text block: the text value

Text Color.description: Label for attribute of text block: the colour of the text

Phone.description: Type of block - creates a button that calls a number

Phone #.description: Label for Phone # attribute on call/sms block

Label.description: The label on a button (for sms/calling)

share_message.message: Check out the app {{app.name}} I made with Mozilla Webmaker
share_message.description: Message that gets sent when a published app is shared to friends

No Apps Message.message: You don't have any apps yet.
No Apps Message.description: Message that is displayed in the profile when current user has no apps

error404.message: Sorry, we couldn't find this page. Would you like to go back to the start?

errorAppNotFound.message: Sorry, this app was not found. Go back to your profile?
errorAppNotFound.description: Error message for app details/editing/play view when the app is not found

errorDefault.message: Oops! There was an error. Go back to your profile?
errorDefault.description: Default error message for alert component

Discover.description: Title for the Discover page (a listing of apps users can choose from)

Start Building.description: Start Building button for creating an app

Data.description: Look at the data collected by an app

Publish.description: Button label for publishing the current app

Join Webmaker.description: Button label for creating an account

My {{template}} App.description: Title for a newly created app from a template

Choosing this option will allow you to c.message: Choosing this option will allow you to create your own app without a preset template.

Have something to share with the world?.message: Have something to share with the world? Start a blog, customize to make it yours and start writing!

If you want to share your skills with ot.message: If you want to share your skills with others, build a mobile lesson plan and teach what you know

Show off your products and give customer.message: Show off your products and give customers an easy way to reach you.

Share photos and write articles and abou.message: Share photos and write articles and about your local community

If you've got unique skills you'd like t.message: If you've got unique skills you'd like to share with others, try making a How To guide.

Add a map, a emergency call button, and.message: Add a map, a emergency call button, and other tips to keep safe in your community

noContactsError.message: To send an SMS, please choose one or more contact.
noContactsError.description: Error if user tries to send an SMS without choosing any contacts
